p: Widespread early treatment could also mitigate local epidemics. Although a proportion of SARS CoV-2 transmission is attributed to asymptomatic and presymptomatic viral shedding, many transmissions result from coughing and sneezing leading to airborne droplets. Household viral load is a determinant of transmission for human herpesviruses (HSVs) [ 18]. Therapeutic reduction in shedding is linked with less transmission for herpes simplex virus-2 [ 19]. Lowering viral load is a mainstay of HIV prevention [ 20]. Even though shedding duration and transmissibility is shorter for influenza than SARS CoV-2, early oseltamivir initiation limits the secondary attack rate to household contacts [ 21].
